trans-unit.source: The Appaloosa The name comes from "Palouse horse" in reference to the Palouse River in Northern Idaho. are rugged horses originally breed by the Nez-Perce tribe in the US Northwest.
trans-unit.target: The Appaloosa The name comes from "Palouse horse" in reference to the Palouse River in Northern Idaho. are rugged horses originally breed by the Nez-Perce tribe in the US Northwest.

trans-unit.source: They are often characterized by their spotted coats, as shown here:
